Haleon Capital Markets Day:Haleon (GSK's former consumer healthcare business) hosted a Capital Markets Day for investors and analysts, providing an update on its strategy and growth outlook.

Haleon Forecasts Medium-term Profit Growth:Haleon, on May 1, 2025, forecast high single-digit percentage growth in its profit from 2026, driven by stable demand and projected cost reductions within its supply chain.

Haleon Stock Transaction:Haleon announced the purchase of 858,714 ordinary shares for cancellation as part of its share buyback program, with transactions occurring on May 1, 2025.

Haleon - Brightseed Collaboration:Haleon and Brightseed announced a strategic collaboration focusing on using AI for small molecule discovery and innovation in human health.
